Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Greg "smitz0327"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for use in school and I have to say I really like this computer. The lap top is very fast, has great memory and a hard drive with enough space for everything you need along with sky drive as long as you have an MSN account. I thought the keyboard lit up on this but my mistake and it isn't a big deal. I have no idea why there are some people out there not liking Windows 8 but I have no problems with it and just have to learn how to get around on it. What also is good about this computer is that the battery can be replaced when it goes bad which is a negative for my Toshiba convertible which is a tablet/lap top. I highly recommend this computer and as usual HP makes another good product.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price but missing something
Reviews.Author: DH "health nut"
Reviews.Content: This little thing is lightweight and fast! Seems to be working well, but what I didn't realize was that it does NOT have a CD drive? I have Office and Smart Draw Photo on CD and can not load them on here, so I had to order an additional external CD drive, still waiting for that to come to see if it works, since it doesn't specify Windows 8. My brother, an MCSE, was surprised that it didn't come with some version of Word on it, but it doesn't, you can either purchase Office 10 or use a trial version. All other files from my old laptop had to be brought over on a flash drive. Another issue you don't think about is the touch screen. It's quite staticy, worse than a normal screen, and if you have dogs, it becomes a dog hair magnet. The hair doesn't blow off and when you go to wipe it off, you end up scrolling to another screen. Kinda funny, but something to think about. All in all, great little computer for the price, but be sure to make provisions if anything you need is on CD, and be prepared to step up the vacuuming, lol!

Reviews.Title: omggg!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this laptop!! It is amazing!! Especially the touchscreen, the HD quality is soo good its so crisp and clear. Also I love the speakers on this, I can really hear the bass when I'm listening to music. & of course can't forget about the windows 8, it was complicated at first but once you learn how to use it..it's a breeze. I love this laptop!!!

Reviews.Title: great laptop!
Reviews.Author: Cinthia V
Reviews.Content: love this laptop!! I don't know why I didn't buy it sooner! It's light, thin, fast and just the right size for a college student like me. The windows 8 at first is tricky but after a while you get the hang of it. Anyways shipping got here very fast got the package within 5 days and couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Matt R Flesher
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop.  I have been using Mac for the past 5 years simply because it runs and windows always seemed to freeze up or cause problems.  This computer is about $400 cheaper than a Mac and runs just as good if not better.  I love it and I love Windows 8 as well.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: The Whiz
Reviews.Content: The laptop does everything I was hoping it would do.The size is perfect and it is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: The price was reasonable
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I like my new laptop computer because it is portable, I can use it in any room and it is lightweight.

Reviews.Title: Good enough
Reviews.Author: Martha Murray
Reviews.Content: Works fine. I'm not a fan of Windows 8, but that's not the laptop's fault. I like that it's thin and lightweight. My main dislike is the touchpad ("mouse") buttons are extremely stiff, a little tough on the thumbs. I do like the option of touch screen and conventional keyboard/mouse-type functions.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: DIANA CORONEL
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my 9 year old son for his b-day he was playing 2hrs max but he also does his homework when he forgets his books at school he prints it and start working he loved it so much I will rate it 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Perfect Computer for me!
Reviews.Author: Nelson C.
Reviews.Content: I gave this laptop computer a five stars because this computer does everything I always wanted. I like its portability, light weight and battery life.  I would recommend this computer to everyone who is searching for a versatile computer.

Reviews.Title: Only complaint is the display
Reviews.Author: personwhoboughtthisproduct "personwhoboughtth...
Reviews.Content: Mostly happy with this computer, but the display is pretty low quality. The screen doesn't offer much contrast, which can make photos look washed out, and the colors vary greatly with slight changes in angle of view. If I weren't dealing with a lot of photos, it would probably be fine. But it's been very frustrating doing any graphic work and seeing how images on this screen look very different when compared to a higher-end product.

Reviews.Title: Charging problem
Reviews.Author: OSAKUADE KAYODE
Reviews.Content: Since the day I open the laptop, the charging has been a problem, right now, it's not even charging at all, I wonder if HP has a quality control team by allowing this type of malfunctioning laptop to be sold out.

Reviews.Title: Does this laptop have a cd player?
Reviews.Author: Avi
Reviews.Content: Does this laptop have a cd player? I want to know how this laptop works? I want to buy one but I want to know if it works good.

Reviews.Title: Damaged product
Reviews.Author: lino davila sandino
Reviews.Content: This computer came damaged the display does not work , as soon as turn it on , the display did not work properly , what I saw its only lines. How can I return it?? How could Amazon allow this things to happened , completely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: no numeric keyboard as shown
Reviews.Author: Gadget girl
Reviews.Content: I was excited about this and after careful decision making on which model to get, I decided on this touchscreen specifically for the numeric keyboard. Well you can imagine my disappointment opening the box to find I had been deceived. although, the computer is pretty and seems a great value, it is just not what I ordered and is going back. It seems like a great laptop though which is why I gave it some stars.. But this is the first product I have received that is not exactly what I thoughtI was purchasing and I won't be happy until I get my $500 back

6GB DDR3 SDRAM (2 DIMM), expandable to 8GB
500GB 5400RPM Hard Drive with HP ProtectSmart Hard Drive Protection
